thread.title: Watch: When Terrell Davis Learned He’s A Hall Of Famer
thread.title_full: Watch: When Terrell Davis Learned He’s A Hall Of Famer

author: Sports – CBS Denver
title: Watch: When Terrell Davis Learned He’s A Hall Of Famer
text:
He got the call for the hall Saturday night. 
The moment he received it, a knock, rather, is priceless. 
The Broncos tweeted out the short clip Tuesday, titling it “The moment you realize you’re a Hall of Famer.” The moment you realize you're a Hall of Famer … pic.twitter.com/d3zBdzMUJt 
— Denver Broncos (@Broncos) February 7, 2017 
Along with six others, Davis will officially be inducted into the Pro Football Hall of Fame Aug. 5 in Canton, Ohio. . @Broncos legend and #PFHOF17 class member @Terrell_Davis recaps his experience from getting measured for his 3 iconic HOF symbols pic.twitter.com/a1indVA5xf
